courseDescription: This course covers the fundamentals of database management with a focus on MySQL. Learn how to create, query, and manage databases.
Explore the basics of C programming language. Learn about variables, loops, functions, and program structure.
This course introduces fundamental algorithms and data structures. Explore sorting, searching, and algorithm analysis.
Learn C++ programming for data structure and algorithms. Cover pointers, classes, and data structure implementations.
Discover software engineering principles, including requirements analysis, design, testing, and project management.
Develop problem-solving skills with real-world examples and coding challenges. Enhance your algorithmic thinking.
Learn object-oriented programming (OOP) with Python. Explore classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Get started with Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing. Deploy and manage scalable applications.
Explore fundamental data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their applications.
